div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
219006Current drinker
105542008Non - drinker
82581004 Ex-drinker
86933000Heavy drinker
228277002Light drinker
43783005Moderate drinker
28127009Social drinker
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 228273003 (Finding relating to alcohol drinking behavior)

publisher.value: National Resource Center for EHR Standards

description.value: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of finding relating to alcohol drinking behavior (finding) of the SNOMED CT
